name: Kento 3D Model Viewer
author: KentoThemes

sections.description:
Display 3D model on wordPress page, post, or custom page, 3D model Rotation, zooming enabled .

Plugin Features

  • 3D model Display.
  • Rotate and Zooming enabled.
  • ShortCodes System.
  • TinyMCE Button added for generating Shortcode.
  • Very Lightweight.

Live Preview: http://kentothemes.com/demo/plugins/kento-3d-model-viewer/
sections.installation:
1. Install as a regular WordPress plugin
  2. Go your Pluings page via WordPress Dashboard and activate it.
  3. Use this shortcode to post or page [model_3d width="500" height="400" source="http://example.com/models/sample-model.obj" ]
  4. 3d texture file and .obj must contain same folder and same server

Shortcode Parameters:

  • width = any number with (px) or (%) ex: 500px or 100%
  • height = any number with (px) or (%) ex: 500px or 100%
  • source = 3d model obj source link (ex: http://example.com/models/sample-model.obj)
sections.faq: Display 3D model on wordPress page, post, or custom page, 3D model Rotation, zooming enabled.
